replies.body:
The biggest cause of the client not opening is inadequate system permissions to access certain files or software packages. As a first step, I recommend ensuring you've assigned the right system permissions with League using [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if that resolved the issue for you.
Yep it fixed it Ty rito targons blade
